**It‚Äôs perfect for highlighting key information, urgent tasks, or anything you want to keep front and center. Stay organized and focused by keeping your most relevant dots pinned and easy to find.**

## üìò How to Use 

üñ±Ô∏è Select a Dot ‚Äî Choose the Dot you want to prioritize.

üìå Click the three points and pin the Dot ‚Äî This will pin the Dot to the top of your list.

### ‚ùå Unpin if Needed 

üìå Click the pin again

üñ±Ô∏è Go to the three points and click in unpin to remove it from the top.

::div{class="flex w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-130 py-4"}
:video{src="/pinned.mp4" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-full" controls autoplay muted loop}
::


### üí°Tips

* You can pin multiple Dots to keep all your important information visible.

* Use pinned Dots for urgent tasks, key notes, or anything you want to reference quickly.
